front.title: Textual Conventions for MIB Modules Using Performance History Based on 15 Minute Intervals

abstract.t: This document defines a set of Textual Conventions for MIB modules that make use of performance history data based on 15 minute intervals. This memo replaces RFC 2493. Changes relative to RFC 2493 are summarized in the MIB module's REVISION clause. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
